d5a0f001-0001-4d53-8001-000000000001.title: Drive Shaft Node
d5a0f001-0001-4d53-8001-000000000001.description:
Drive shaft connection endpoint
Connect two nodes with logic wire
Link one node to the controller

d5a0f002-0002-4d53-8002-000000000002.title: Drive Shaft Controller
d5a0f002-0002-4d53-8002-000000000002.description:
Double U-joint drive shaft controller
Press E to open settings panel
Adjust color and scale

d5a0f003-0003-4d53-8003-000000000003.title: Drive Shaft Speed Sensor
d5a0f003-0003-4d53-8003-000000000003.description:
Mount on wheels or rotating parts
Connect to controller
Shaft follows sensor rotation

d5a0f007-0007-4d53-8007-000000000007.title: Drive Shaft Node (1x2)
d5a0f007-0007-4d53-8007-000000000007.description:
For even-width vehicles
Occupies 1x2 block space
Same usage as standard node

d5a0f008-0008-4d53-8008-000000000008.title: Drive Shaft Node (2x2)
d5a0f008-0008-4d53-8008-000000000008.description:
For even-width vehicles
Occupies 2x2 block space
Same usage as standard node
